metatags.twitter:title: Can an Unlicensed Driver Drive in an Emergency?
metatags.og:title: Can an Unlicensed Driver Drive in an Emergency?
metatags.og:description: It is against the law for any person to drive without a valid license, no matter what the circumstance or emergency situation is. Every state in the U.S. may punish unlicensed drivers by imposing hefty fines, jail time, or both.
